problems.title: Determine Type of Triangle by Angles
problems.description:
Given three angles of a triangle, determine its type:
- Acute: All angles < 90 degrees
- Right: One angle = 90 degrees
- Obtuse: One angle > 90 degrees

Also validate if the angles form a valid triangle (sum must be 180 degrees).
If invalid, print "Invalid Triangle".

Input Format:
Three integers separated by space representing the three angles in degrees.

Output Format:
Print "Acute", "Right", "Obtuse", or "Invalid Triangle".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
60 60 60

Sample Output
Acute

Sample Input
90 45 45

Sample Output
Right

Sample Input
120 30 30

Sample Output
Obtuse

Sample Input
100 50 20

Sample Output
Invalid Triangle

Explanation:
First check if sum equals 180. Then check if any angle is 90 (Right), > 90 (Obtuse), or all < 90 (Acute).
hintsList: First check if sum equals 180. Then check if any angle is 90 (Right), any angle > 90 (Obtuse), else all < 90 (Acute).
